title: Upgrade hadoop to version 2.7.6
description:
The current hadoop libraries included in Solr contain some security vulnerabilities and bugs. It would be good if it could be upgraded to a more recent version.

Some of the security vulnerabilities affecting hadoop version 2.7.4:

	https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-15718
	https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-15713
